title: Gurren Lagann (Dual Audio) [BD 1080p] [FLAC] Complete
description:
I decided to re-upload this gurren lagann because a lot of people were having trouble with the english audio. I switched the audio to FLAC so there shouldn't be any issues now. It's a lot better quality anyways.

I also got rid of the extra subtitles as the ruell-raws ones were a lot better, and I added the bonus episodes (OVA and the episode 06 as it aired).
